author: PAYCOM SOFTWARE, INC.
title: Paycom Nationally Recognized for Positive Workplace Culture, Outstanding Benefits | PAYC Stock News
text:
Paycom Nationally Recognized for Positive Workplace Culture, Outstanding Benefits
Paycom Software, Inc. (NYSE: PAYC) has been recognized for its positive workplace culture and outstanding benefits by employee review platform Comparably. The company ranked No. 5 among large companies for both happiest employees and best perks & benefits in the U.S. and Canada. Paycom was also listed for best work-life balance.
Paycom offers generous benefits including $1-per-pay-period individual health insurance, 401(k) with generous matching, paid family leave, and pet insurance. The company's founder, CEO, and chairman, Chad Richison, emphasized their focus on creating the best employee experience.
Comparably Awards are based on anonymous employee feedback over a 12-month period. Paycom has previously earned accolades for Best Company for Career Growth, Best Company Leadership, Best Company Outlook, and Best Sales Team.
Paycom Software, Inc. (NYSE: PAYC) è stata riconosciuta per la sua cultura lavorativa positiva e per i suoi eccellenti benefici dalla piattaforma di recensioni per dipendenti Comparably. L'azienda si è classificata al 5° posto tra le grandi aziende sia per i dipendenti più felici che per i migliori vantaggi e benefici negli Stati Uniti e in Canada. Paycom è stata anche menzionata per il miglior equilibrio tra vita lavorativa e vita privata.
Paycom offre vantaggi generosi tra cui assicurazione sanitaria individuale di $1 per periodo di pagamento, 401(k) con un matching generoso, congedo familiare retribuito e assicurazione per animali domestici. Il fondatore, CEO e presidente dell'azienda, Chad Richison, ha sottolineato la loro attenzione nel creare la migliore esperienza per i dipendenti.
Gli Awards di Comparably si basano sul feedback anonimo dei dipendenti in un periodo di 12 mesi. Paycom ha precedentemente ricevuto riconoscimenti per miglior azienda per la crescita professionale, miglior leadership aziendale, miglior prospettiva aziendale e miglior team di vendita.
Paycom Software, Inc. (NYSE: PAYC) ha sido reconocida por su positiva cultura laboral y por sus excelentes beneficios por la plataforma de revisión de empleados Comparably. La compañía ocupó el quinto lugar entre las grandes empresas tanto para los empleados más felices como para los mejores beneficios en EE.UU. y Canadá. Paycom también fue destacada por su balance entre trabajo y vida personal.
Paycom ofrece generosos beneficios que incluyen seguro de salud individual de $1 por periodo de pago, 401(k) con una generosa aportación igualada, licencia familiar pagada y seguro para mascotas. El fundador, CEO y presidente de la empresa, Chad Richison, enfatizó su enfoque en crear la mejor experiencia para los empleados.
Los Premios de Comparably se basan en la retroalimentación anónima de los empleados durante un período de 12 meses. Paycom ha recibido previamente reconocimientos por mejor empresa para el crecimiento profesional, mejor liderazgo empresarial, mejor perspectiva empresarial y mejor equipo de ventas.
Paycom Software, Inc. (NYSE: PAYC)는 직원 리뷰 플랫폼 Comparably에서 긍정적인 직장 문화와 뛰어난 복리후생으로 인정받았습니다. 이 회사는 미국과 캐나다에서 대기업 중 5위에 올랐으며, 가장 행복한 직원과 최고의 복지 및 혜택 부문에서 선정되었습니다. Paycom은 또한 최고의 일과 삶의 균형을 위해 목록에 올랐습니다.
Paycom은 급여 주기당 $1의 개인 건강 보험, 관대 한 매칭이 포함된 401(k), 유급 가족 휴직 및 반려동물 보험 등의 풍부한 혜택을 제공합니다. 회사의 설립자이자 CEO이자 의장인 Chad Richison은 최고의 직원 경험을 만드는 데 중점을 두고 있음을 강조했습니다.
Comparably Awards는 12개월 동안의 익명 직원 피드백을 기반으로 합니다. Paycom은 이전에도 경력 성장에 대한 최고의 회사, 최고 경영진, 최고의 회사 전망, 최고의 판매 팀 등으로 인정받았습니다.
Paycom Software, Inc. (NYSE: PAYC) a été reconnue pour sa culture de travail positive et ses avantages exceptionnels par la plateforme d'évaluation des employés Comparably. L'entreprise s'est classée 5e parmi les grandes entreprises pour ses employés les plus heureux ainsi que pour ses meilleurs avantages aux États-Unis et au Canada. Paycom a également été mentionnée pour le meilleur équilibre entre vie professionnelle et vie personnelle.
Paycom propose des avantages généreux, notamment une assurance maladie individuelle à 1 $ par période de paie, un 401(k) avec un apport généreux, des congés familiaux payés et une assurance pour animaux de compagnie. Le fondateur, PDG et président de l'entreprise, Chad Richison, a souligné leur engagement à créer la meilleure expérience pour les employés.
Les Comparably Awards sont basés sur des retours d'expérience anonymes des employés sur une période de 12 mois. Paycom a précédemment reçu des distinctions pour meilleure entreprise pour la croissance de carrière, meilleure direction d'entreprise, meilleur aperçu de l'entreprise et meilleure équipe de vente.
Paycom Software, Inc. (NYSE: PAYC) wurde von der Mitarbeiterbewertungsplattform Comparably für ihre positive Unternehmenskultur und hervorragenden Vorteile ausgezeichnet. Das Unternehmen belegte den 5. Platz unter großen Unternehmen sowohl für die glücklichsten Mitarbeiter als auch für die besten Vergünstigungen und Benefits in den USA und Kanada. Paycom wurde zudem für die beste Work-Life-Balance gelistet.
Paycom bietet großzügige Vorteile, darunter 1-Dollar-pro-Zahlungsperiode individuelle Krankenversicherung, 401(k) mit großzügiger Arbeitgeberbeteiligung, bezahlte Familienurlaubszeit und Tierversicherung. Der Gründer, CEO und Vorsitzende des Unternehmens, Chad Richison, betonte die Fokussierung auf die Schaffung der besten Mitarbeitererfahrung.
Die Comparably Awards basieren auf anonymem Mitarbeiterfeedback über einen Zeitraum von 12 Monaten. Paycom erhielt zuvor Auszeichnungen für beste Firma für Karrierewachstum, beste Unternehmensführung, beste Unternehmensperspektive und bestes Verkaufsteam.

Paycom Software, Inc. (NYSE: PAYC) (“Paycom”), a leading provider of comprehensive, cloud-based human capital management software, was recognized for its workplace culture from employee review and salary platform Comparably.
Paycom ranked at No. 5 among large companies with the happiest employees in the
“It’s an honor to receive these recognitions because they came directly from our employees,” said Chad Richison, Paycom founder, CEO and chairman. “We’re focused on creating the best employee experience for companies around the world through our software, and that’s no different for our own employees.”
Paycom offers generous benefits to its employees, including
Comparably Awards are based on sentiment feedback from current employees who anonymously rated their employers on Comparably’s website during a 12-month period. Recognized companies were determined by the following criteria:
- Happiest Employees: feedback on factors that contribute to happiness at work, including positive environment, fair pay, great benefits and more
- Best Perks & Benefits: feedback on perks, paid time off and benefit satisfaction
- Best Work-Life Balance: feedback on work-life balance, average hours worked per day, lunch breaks, time off and more
A Paycom employee from the finance department spoke highly of Paycom’s culture in a Comparably review, writing, “I’m happy knowing the work I do makes a difference in this growing company, but most importantly, the friendships I have made [at Paycom] make my job very enjoyable.”
Paycom earned additional accolades from Comparably earlier this year, including
Best Company for Career Growth, Best Company Leadership, Best Company Outlook and Best Sales Team.
To learn more about employment opportunities at Paycom, visit
paycom.com/careers.
About Paycom

And thanks to its industry-first solution, Beti®, employees now do their own payroll and are guided to find and fix costly errors before payroll submission. From onboarding and benefits enrollment to talent management and more, Paycom’s software streamlines processes, drives efficiencies and gives employees power over their own HR information, all in a single app. Recognized nationally for its technology and workplace culture, Paycom can now serve businesses of all sizes in the
